Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text, writ large.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394035) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394035)
Additional IDs: Excavation/small finds number: 32-33/226A (Egypt Exploration Society excavation number)
